articles.description: The USC men's basketball game against Oklahoma State in the Compete 4 Cause Classic this Tuesday (Dec. 21) in Oklahoma City has been canceled due to confirmed COVID-19 cases within the Trojans program.

articles.title: Rams vs. Seahawks: TV broadcast map for rescheduled Week 15 game - Rams Wire
articles.description: Rams-Seahawks is one of two games at 7 pm ET on Tuesday, so check the broadcast map to see which game you’ll get on TV.
articles.content: The NFL had to tweak the Week 15 schedule this weekend due to COVID-19 outbreaks with three teams, including the Los Angeles Rams. The league moved Rams-Seahawks and Washington-Eagles to Tuesday, and… [+861 chars]
